sentence: Until we have comprehensive, bipartisan immigration reform that commits to securing our borders and providing a pathway to citizenship for qualified immigrants, Title 42 must stay in place.” Both Arizona Senators Mark Kelly (D) and Kyrsten Sinema (D) have have expressed concerns about ending the order to DHS Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas, and Sen. Maggie Hassan (D-NH) has said that she is concerned about a massive surge at the border.
author: Becky Noble
title: GOP States Sue As Biden Adm. Lifts Title 42 Order, Expected To Create Surge Of Illegal Immigrants At Border

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly, have asked the Biden administration to hold off on lifting Title 42 to better prepare for an expected increase in asylum seekers.
title: Missouri among states suing to stop Biden administration from ending asylum limits

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly are warning Biden against ending the “border restrictions without a comprehensive plan” to secure the border.
author: Elvia Díaz
title: Tired of COVID-19 restrictions? Then don't complain about the end of Title 42

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly, have asked the Biden administration to hold off on lifting Title 42 to better prepare for an expected increase in asylum seekers.
title: Federal lawsuit seeks to block end to sweeping U.S. asylum limits
